B

Barrier - Class in parallel
A class implementing the Barrier concept in parallel/distributed computing.
Barrier(int) - Constructor for class parallel.Barrier
private constructor in accordance with the Singleton(s) Design Pattern.
barrier() - Method in class parallel.Barrier
main method of the class: it waits until _origNumThreads threads enter this method, and it guarantees that if a thread enters this method again before all threads have exited the previous barrier() call it will wait first for all the other threads to exit and then will proceed.
barrier() - Method in class parallel.ComplexBarrier
main method of the class: it waits until _origNumThreads threads enter this method, and it guarantees that if a thread enters this method again before all threads have exited the previous barrier() call it will wait first for all the other threads to exit and then will proceed.
barrier() - Method in class parallel.distributed.DBarrier
the main class method.
BarrierTest - Class in parallel
test-driver for the Barrier class.
BarrierTest() - Constructor for class parallel.BarrierTest
single public constructor.
BarrierTest.BThread - Class in parallel
auxiliary inner class, not part of the public API.

BBGASPPacker - Class in graph.packing
implements a hybrid parallel GASP-Branch & Bound heuristic scheme for the 1- or 2-packing problem in graphs.
BBGASPPacker() - Constructor for class graph.packing.BBGASPPacker
sole public no-arg constructor.
BBNode1 - Class in graph.packing
represents a node in the B & B tree of the hybrid B & B - GASP scheme for the 1-packing problem (max weighted independent set problem).
BBNode1(BBTree, Set, BBNode1) - Constructor for class graph.packing.BBNode1
Sole constructor of a BBNode1 object.
BBNode2 - Class in graph.packing
represents a node in the B&B tree of the hybrid B&B - GASP scheme for the 2-packing problem.
BBNode2(BBTree, Set, BBNode2) - Constructor for class graph.packing.BBNode2
Sole constructor of a BBNode2 object.
BBNodeBase - Class in graph.packing
represents a node in the B&B tree of the hybrid B&B - GASP scheme for packing problems.
BBNodeBase(BBTree, Set, BBNodeBase) - Constructor for class graph.packing.BBNodeBase
Sole constructor of a BBNodeBase object.
BBNodeComparator1 - Class in graph.packing
Balanced comparator that mostly takes into account the bound-based estimate for the corresponding BB-node (resembling a Best-First Search), turning into Depth-First Search when the bound estimates are close to each other.
BBNodeComparator1() - Constructor for class graph.packing.BBNodeComparator1

BBNodeComparator1DFS() - Constructor for class graph.packing.BBNodeComparator1DFS
sole public constructor.
BBNodeComparator1LvlBndCstComb - Class in graph.packing
Level-dependent Search for the Max Weighted Independent Set problem (MWIS).
BBNodeComparator1LvlBndCstComb(int) - Constructor for class graph.packing.BBNodeComparator1LvlBndCstComb
sole public constructor.
BBNodeComparator2 - Class in graph.packing
This comparator is Depth-First-Search in spirit, and only differs from DFS when two solutions are "very similar", in which case, the bound of each soln will be the determinant factor in which soln is examined first.
BBNodeComparator2() - Constructor for class graph.packing.BBNodeComparator2
sole public constructor.
BBNodeComparatorIntf - Interface in graph.packing
comparator for BBNodeBase objects.

BCastSrv - Class in parallel.distributed
A broadcast object server, that broadcasts to all clients connected to it, any object received by any of the connected clients.
BCastSrv(int, int) - Constructor for class parallel.distributed.BCastSrv
sole constructor specifies the port and the length of the data buffer in bytes.
BCastSrv2DAccumulatorBridge - Class in parallel.distributed
small bridge program that connects to a BCastSrv server as another client, as well as to a DAccumulatorSrv for getting its notifications, and submitting them to the broadcast server.
BCastSrv2DAccumulatorBridge() - Constructor for class parallel.distributed.BCastSrv2DAccumulatorBridge
sole constructor.

BoltzmanSchedule - Class in popt4jlib.SA

BoolVector - Class in popt4jlib
represents a vector of booleans (alternative to BitSet, or Set<Long> that in fact may hold bit-sets of arbitrarily large size).
BoolVector(int) - Constructor for class popt4jlib.BoolVector
public constructor, specifying the max number of bits this vector may hold.
BoolVector(int, boolean) - Constructor for class popt4jlib.BoolVector
public constructor, allowing to set all bits in this vector if the 2nd argument is true.
BoolVector(Set, int) - Constructor for class popt4jlib.BoolVector
public constructor, specifying both the max number of bits this vector may hold, and the initial bits set for it, held as integers in the first argument.
BoolVector(BoolVector) - Constructor for class popt4jlib.BoolVector
public copy constructor.

auxiliary nested class, not part of the public API.

auxiliary nested class not part of the public API.

BoundedMinHeapUnsynchronized - Class in parallel
a bounded-length Min-Heap data structure, supporting insert/remove-min/ decrease-key operations in O(logN) time.
BoundedMinHeapUnsynchronized(int) - Constructor for class parallel.BoundedMinHeapUnsynchronized
public constructor will assume that the objects to be passed in will be pairs of the form utils.Pair(Object first, Double second) and the comparison between objects will be on the basis of the second argument of the pair (unless second arguments are equal).
BoundedMinHeapUnsynchronized(int, Comparator) - Constructor for class parallel.BoundedMinHeapUnsynchronized
specifies also the Comparator for the objects to be maintained in this min-heap.
BoundedMinHeapUnsynchronized(BoundedMinHeapUnsynchronized) - Constructor for class parallel.BoundedMinHeapUnsynchronized
 
BoundedMinHeapUnsynchronized.BoundedMinHeapIterator - Class in parallel
auxiliary nested class to provide an java.util.Iterator interface for traversing this min-heap (in order).
BoundedMinHeapUnsynchronized.PairSecondArgDblComparator - Class in parallel
auxiliary static inner-class used as default comparator for heap.

bP(int, int, double, double, double, double) - Static method in class tests.sic.rnqt.nbin.RnQTCnbin
computes the average long-run expected back-order costs of a single-echelon system facing demands that follow the Negative Binomial (ie compound Poisson) distribution with arrival rate lambda and process parameter of the Logarithmic distribution p, with an (r,nQ,T) periodic-review policy, taking into account fixed costs (review and ordering costs).
bP(int, int, double, double, double, Poisson) - Static method in class tests.sic.rnqt.poisson.RnQTCpoisson
 
bP(double, double, double, double, double) - Static method in class tests.sic.sST.norm.sSTCnorm
compute linear back-order costs in an (s,S,T) echelon installation facing normal demands.
bP(int, double, double, double, Poisson) - Static method in class tests.sic.sST.poisson.sSTCpoisson
